snippet: On the eve of planned May Day protests across the country, envelopes containing an unidentified white powder were sent to Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg and to six bank branches in Manhattan.
abstract: Envelopes containing an unidentified white powder are sent to New York Mayor Michael R Bloomberg and to six bank branches in Manhattan, on eve of planned May Day protests across the country; envelopes, which led to evacuations and shutdowns of the bank branches, are later found to be harmless; no person or group immediately claims responsibility for the mailings.
lead_paragraph: On the eve of planned May Day protests across the country, envelopes containing an unidentified white powder were sent to Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg and to six bank branches in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Envelopes With White Powder Sent to Bloomberg and 6 Banks
headline.main: Envelopes With White Powder Sent to Mayor and 6 Banks
headline.print_headline: Envelopes With White Powder Sent to Mayor and 6 Banks
